ygData.subject: Re: Ice Comet
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you know what you take in. For example, I m now soloing (at 9th) Desert Tarantula, because, by experience, these critters don t hit me enough. The only
ygData.messageBody:
According to Ken Morris:
> For the record, I don't believe wizards should solo past 5th lvl. Your
> chances of dying increase dramatically when soloing. Having said that, we

If you know what you take in. For example, I'm now soloing (at 9th) Desert
Tarantula, because, by experience, these critters don't hit me enough. The
only time it is borderline is when I get three fizzle in the fight. *Then*
I start to sweat. At 10th, I know I'll get into Sand Scarabs, because these
guys are almost doable on my own right now (if I don't get a fizzle at all).

When soloing, the trick is to know which target to hunt. Pumas are significantly
weaker than Tarantulas, but they tend to hit more often (without Poison), so
I usually end up with less HP remaining after a fight with a Puma.

> strategize carefully and leave yourself a way to escape if things go bad,
> there's no lvl that you can't solo.

Agreed.

--
